idea-plugin.name: TODO++
idea-plugin.description:
Turbocharge Your TODOs with TODO++

TODO++ (Todo Plus) transforms standard TODO comments into a powerful task management system directly within IntelliJ IDEA. Organize, track, and complete tasks without leaving your code.

‚ú® Status: v1.6.4 (Stable & Polished)

üî• Key Features:

  • Advanced Syntax: Support for @assignee, priority:high, due:today, and custom tags.
  • Smart Scanning: Automatically finds TODOs in Java, Kotlin, Python, JavaScript, SQL, Shell, and 10+ other languages.
  • Custom Priorities: Define your own priority levels (e.g., CRITICAL, OPTIONAL) with custom colors.
  • Due Date Tracking: Highlights overdue tasks in RED and upcoming tasks in ORANGE.
  • Issue Tracker Integration: Click to open GitHub/Jira issues directly from the TODO list (matches PROJ-123).
  • Robust Filtering: Filter by Assignee, Priority, Category, or arbitrary tags (e.g., risk:high).
  • Seamless Navigation: Double-click to jump straight to the code line.

üìù Usage Examples:

// TODO(@john priority:critical due:today): Fix production crash
// TODO(feature:login risk:low): Add "Remember Me" checkbox
# TODO(issue:PROJ-456): Refactor database schema (Python support!)

Installation Note: Please restart the IDE after installation to ensure all features load correctly.
